attributes.action: Suspend temporary the commissions taken by app based ride hailing companies.
attributes.additional_details: Suspend temporary the commissions taken by app based ride hailing companies such as UBER, Bolt, etc, to minimalise the loss of earnings for workers as most of them are self employed. The service provided by these apps are probably the safest right now as we can minimalise the social contact. Saving the workers those commissions they loose less income during the very insecure period of time they face due to the Coronavirus Pandemic.
attributes.background: Suspend temporary the commissions taken by app based ride hailing companies such as UBER, Bolt, etc, to minimalise the loss of earnings for workers as most of them are self employed. The service provided by these app are probably the safest.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual providers.
